author: Kyle Wiggers
title: Twitter begins rolling out $7.99 Twitter Blue plan with verification, fewer ads
description: Twitter has begun rolling out a pricier Twitter Blue plan, starting at $7.99 per month, that includes verification and ostensibly fewer ads.

author: Natasha Mascarenhas
title: Jack Dorsey breaks his silence, owns “responsibility for why everyone is in this situation” at Twitter
description: Jack Dorsey breaks his silence to address Twitter's layoffs, which impacted approximately 50% of the social media company's staff.
content: Jack Dorsey, who stepped down as Twitter CEO less than one year ago, finally addressed the layoffs that impacted approximately 50% of the company he co-founded in 2006. The workforce reduction, led b… [+2300 chars]

title: Bitwise’s Katherine Dowling talks rules and regs at TC Sessions: Crypto
